programme.title: Radyo Patrol Balita
programme.desc: Radyo Patrol Balita focuses on delivering the latest news, breaking events, and important issues that matter to you.

programme.title: Tandem Ng Bayan
programme.desc: Tandem Ng Bayan brings you discussions on the day's top news stories, providing analysis and engaging in commentary on political as well as social issues.

programme.title: Magandang Buhay
programme.desc: "Momshies" Jolina Magdangal, Melai Cantiveros, and Regine Velasquez kick off the morning with good vibes as they share a chat with celebrities on topics easily relatable to Filipino families.

programme.title: Goin' Bulilit S15
programme.desc: This comical spin-off of the 80s comedy programme Goin' Bananas is currently the Philippines' most successful children's comedy show, created and directed by one of Goin' Bananas' original stars, Bobot Mortiz.

programme.title: TV Patrol Express Live
programme.desc: Comprehensive and incisive, TV Patrol is the benchmark in Philippines news journalism, bringing you the most relevant news delivered by the country's best news anchors.

programme.title: BRGY S4
programme.desc: BRGY features interesting and humorous stories about Filipinos and businesses in North America.

programme.title: TV Patrol Live
programme.desc: Comprehensive and incisive, TV Patrol is the benchmark in Philippines news journalism, bringing you the most relevant news delivered by the country's best news anchors.

programme.title: FPJ's Batang Quiapo
programme.desc: A young man rises to be one of the biggest outlaws in the neighbourhood while he navigates his way in life to survive in Quiapo. Hoping to earn the affection of his parents, his feat draws him closer to the truth about his identity.

programme.title: Roja
programme.desc: A paradise like no other - La Playa Roja is your ultimate escape! But behind its beauty lies danger, and soon, you'll see RED. Are you ready for the fight to survive?

programme.title: What Lies Beneath
programme.desc: The lives of four individuals are turned upside down after they witness the murder of their friend. They band together to put the alleged killer behind bars, but years later, the imprisoned man seeks revenge, unraveling dark secrets that test their loyalty and survival.

programme.title: It's Showtime
programme.desc: Hosted by an all-star cast, It's Showtime is a variety show unlike any other. Watch as people from all over come on stage to showcase their skills and creativity in this one-of-a-kind talent show full of fun and prizes.

programme.title: Goin' Bulilit
programme.desc: This comical spin-off of the 80s comedy programme Goin' Bananas is currently the Philippines' most successful children's comedy show, created and directed by one of Goin' Bananas' original stars, Bobot Mortiz.

programme.title: Lavender Fields
programme.desc: The life of a simple flower farm girl is shattered when she falls for a charming accountant, who turns out to be a married gun cartel member. Targeted for his stolen money, she loses everything she holds dear and reinvents herself to seek justice.

programme.title: FPJ's Batang Quiapo

programme.title: Pamilya Sagrado
programme.desc: Being a prominent political clan, the Sagrados want nothing but to keep their name faultless and sacred, until a controversial incident comes their way.

programme.desc: Comprehensive and incisive, TV Patrol is the benchmark in Philippines news journalism, bringing you the most relevant news delivered by the country's best news anchors.

programme.title: Saka Saka
programme.desc: Two siblings, Alex and Abner, get involved in the violent world of Saka-Saka, or political assassins.

programme.title: Ngayon At Kailanman
programme.desc: Eva fights to reclaim her place in the wealthy Cortes family while searching for the truth about her identity. Fate brings her together with Inno, and their love story endures family secrets, rivalry and tragedy as they discover the real meaning of forgiveness and redemption.

programme.title: BRGY S4
programme.desc: BRGY features interesting and humorous stories about Filipinos and businesses in North America.

programme.title: TFC Kids Zone
programme.desc: A programme block filled with animated short stories, nursery rhymes and songs, as well as Filipino language lessons, TFC Kids' Zone promises a rich treasure trove of learning and discovery that parents and their young ones will find enriching and empowering.

programme.desc: A daily celebration of the Liturgy of the Lord.

programme.title: Silong
programme.desc: Doctor Miguel Cascarro is still mourning the death of his wife Caroline while he scrambles to save his family home from creditors. As he drives home one day, he finds a badly-beaten and bloody Valerie on a deserted country road and takes her home to nurse her back to health.

programme.title: Lumuhod ka sa Lupa Bagong Yugto ep 163
programme.desc: The saga continues in the second season/installment of the classic Carlo J. Caparas' adaptation. Stars Kiko Estrada, Sarah Labahti, and Gardo Versoza.

programme.title: Lumuhod ka sa Lupa Bagong Yugto ep 164
programme.desc: The saga continues in the second season/installment of the classic Carlo J. Caparas' adaptation. Stars Kiko Estrada, Sarah Labahti, and Gardo Versoza.

programme.title: Minsan Pa Natin Hagkan ang Nakaraan ep 31
programme.desc: A woman who was severely broken by her greatest love finds love again in an older man who did everything to put her back together. Just when she thought her life is finally back to normal, her greatest love comes back, determined to work for her forgiveness and win her back—even if it means breaking her family apart.

programme.title: Totoy Bato ep 176
programme.desc: Totoy Bato explores the origins, the pathos of the character Totoy. All the different battle he went through (terrorist, revenge for his wife, corruption, prejudice and for love) defines him as a character.

programme.title: Para sa Isa't Isa ep 17
programme.desc: Zion gets another shot at repairing his relationship with his wife, Erin by a wish on a well to go back in time. But he finds Erin not knowing him at all. He must now correct his mistakes and make her fall in love with him again.

programme.title: Mga Kwentong Epik: Bernardo Carpio ep 6
programme.desc: Live action series of original Epik superheroes and comic book characters.

programme.title: Kurdapya ep 3
programme.desc: Kurdapya tells the story of long-lost twins, KURING \u0026 DAPHNE. They meet after a strange accident and discover that they lead extremely different lives. Kuring grew up with the cruel extended family in the province while Daphne is an undervalued publishing executive in the city. Both women want to get out of their current realities, so they decide to switch lives by pretending to be each other

programme.title: Beh Buti Nga ep 5
programme.desc: After making a fortune from Bitcoin, Axel gets back at the girls who once broke his heart. When he succeeds, he makes it a mission to help his high school barkada to become confident heartbreakers. However, things take a turn when Isabelle their only female friend in high school starts forming a bond with Axel and he falls in love with her for real.

programme.title: Kagat ng Dilim 2020 ep 4
programme.desc: REBOOT: Urban legends and urban horror stories set against a backdrop of modern-day events and headlines, terrifying tales told in mock-documentary style make up this groundbreaking original horror series.

programme.title: Totoy Bato ep 177
programme.desc: Totoy Bato explores the origins, the pathos of the character Totoy. All the different battle he went through (terrorist, revenge for his wife, corruption, prejudice and for love) defines him as a character.

programme.title: Minsan Pa Natin Hagkan ang Nakaraan ep 32
programme.desc: A woman who was severely broken by her greatest love finds love again in an older man who did everything to put her back together. Just when she thought her life is finally back to normal, her greatest love comes back, determined to work for her forgiveness and win her back—even if it means breaking her family apart.

programme.title: From the Beautiful Country ep 8
programme.desc: A Sari-Sari original series. Four beauty pageant contestants find themselves prime suspects when another contestant winds up dead. Each girl has her motive, but which one of them did it? And which one will end up with the crown?

programme.title: Para sa Isa't Isa ep 17
programme.desc: Zion gets another shot at repairing his relationship with his wife, Erin by a wish on a well to go back in time. But he finds Erin not knowing him at all. He must now correct his mistakes and make her fall in love with him again.

programme.title: Mga Kwentong Epik: Bernardo Carpio ep 6
programme.desc: Live action series of original Epik superheroes and comic book characters.

programme.title: The Mysterious Case of Bea Montenegro ep 6
programme.desc: A Sari-Sari Original Series. Hot off the heels from her last cold case, investigative journalist Christine Del Mundo (Maui Taylor) is back with a brand new cold case. This time, it involves actress Bea Montenegro, whose death has only brought forth one suspect - a fellow model who suffers from face blindness.

programme.title: Kagat ng Dilim 2020 ep 4
programme.desc: REBOOT: Urban legends and urban horror stories set against a backdrop of modern-day events and headlines, terrifying tales told in mock-documentary style make up this groundbreaking original horror series.

programme.title: Sari Saring Sine: Pik Pak Boom
programme.desc: Pik Pak Boom is a 1988 Filipino anthology comedy film directed by Leroy Salvador and starring Herbert Bautista, Lea Salonga, Lilet, Bing Loyzaga, Regine Velasquez, and Dingdong Avanzado. The film consists of two segments: \"Manyika\" (lit. 'Doll') and \"Banana Q\".

programme.title: Minsan Pa Natin Hagkan ang Nakaraan ep 32
programme.desc: A woman who was severely broken by her greatest love finds love again in an older man who did everything to put her back together. programme.title: Totoy Bato ep 177
programme.desc: Totoy Bato explores the origins, the pathos of the character Totoy. All the different battle he went through (terrorist, revenge for his wife, corruption, prejudice and for love) defines him as a character.

programme.title: Di na Muli ep 1
programme.desc:
‘Di Na Muli tells the story of a young woman who tries to overcome her 
life's biggest regret (complicated by her special ability to see how much 
time remains of someone’s life) but ends up falling in love with the man 
who caused the death of her one great lov.

programme.title: Para sa Isa't Isa ep 17
programme.desc: Zion gets another shot at repairing his relationship with his wife, Erin by a wish on a well to go back in time. But he finds Erin not knowing him at all. He must now correct his mistakes and make her fall in love with him again.

programme.title: Mga Kwentong Epik: Bernardo Carpio ep 6
programme.desc: Live action series of original Epik superheroes and comic book characters.

programme.title: Afterlife ep 3
programme.desc: Peter, a deceased Filipino-Chinese businessman, returns as a ghost and is bonded to Romy, a Filipino caretaker of a Chinese temple. He sets out to let his family know the whole truth through Romy.

programme.desc: The saga continues in the second season/installment of the classic Carlo J. Caparas' adaptation. Stars Kiko Estrada, Sarah Labahti, and Gardo Versoza.

programme.title: Ghost Adventures S1 ep 13
programme.desc: A clairvoyant repairman fearful of ghosts is forced to help them cross over so they can leave him in peace. On his journey of helping these ghosts with their unfinished businesses, he ends up getting into trouble with their families, friends and the community they are all living in. Will he be able to get these ghosts and their love ones, at the same time face his fear of them?

programme.desc: Masaganang Buhay.

programme.title: Wanted Sa Radyo
programme.desc: Match Made.

programme.title: LIVE Ted Failon DJ Cha Cha Sa Radyo 5
Tiktoclock: Happy Hour Na
programme.desc: A game-variety show showcasing talents of Filipinos in singing, dancing and many more.

programme.title: Unica Hija
programme.desc: The tragic death of his daughter and the ensuing breakdown of his marriage leads a scientist to clone his daughter, with the hope of bringing his wife back to him. However, others take interest in his daring but morally questionable experiment, leading to his demise. Bianca, the clone, is taken in by an unsuspecting couple, and is raised as their own. Years later, the cloning is discovered. Bianca

programme.title: Cruz Vs. Cruz
programme.desc: is a story of the two families of Ryan Cruz. He left his original family in the Philippines to work abroad and provide for them. During his time as an OFW, he meets a woman who lures him to marry her after she gets pregnant.

programme.title: Hating Kapatid
programme.desc: The series follows twin siblings Tyron and Belle, separated at birth and raised in vastly different worlds. When fate brings them together, their bond sparks a journey of discovery, love, and rivalry-- unaware of the truth that binds them.

programme.title: Sanggang
programme.desc: Two law-enforcers, each burdened by personal loss, are forced to work together when a high-profile murder implicates an action star. Their investigation unravels a deeper conspiracy linking their own families to the crimes, testing their loyalty, trust, and pursuit of justice.

programme.title: Encantadia Chronicles: Sang'gre
programme.desc: The series is a spin-off to the Philippine television fantasy drama series, Encantadia.

programme.title: Family Feud
programme.desc: It features two families who compete to name the most popular answers to survey questions in order to win cash and prizes

programme.title: Fast Talk With Boy Abunda
programme.desc: The latest multi-platform showbiz news and talk show on Kapuso network.

programme.title: 24 Oras
programme.desc: Gives an up-to-the minute news here and around the world.

programme.title: Encantadia Chronicles: Sang'gre
programme.desc: The series is a spin-off to the Philippine television fantasy drama series, Encantadia.

programme.title: Pbb Teens
programme.desc: The TV reality competition follows the same premise as its many foreign counterparts around the world wherein a number of Filipinos volunteered to live inside a house for a certain number of days.

programme.title: I
programme.desc: A documentary on the different issues in society hosted by a set of trusted broadcast journalists in the country

programme.title: Tadhana
programme.desc: An Overseas Filipino Workers themed weekly anthology that will dramatize the colorful, romantic, heroic, and inspiring stories of OFWs.

programme.title: Regal Studio Presents
programme.desc: A collection of weekly specials which feature timely, feel-good stories.

programme.title: Unang Hirit

programme.title: Wish Ko Lang
programme.desc: The first wish-granting program on Philippine television, featuring inspiring stories of ordinary Filipinos as they struggle to overcome extraordinary situations.

programme.title: Maka
programme.desc: It is a youth-oriented drama series that follows the lives of six high school students enrolled in the Arts & Performance section of public school, Douglas Mac Arthur High School for the Arts aka. MAKA.

programme.title: Born To Be Wild
programme.desc: Adventures that explore the unknown and take viewers to an amazing wildlife encounter.

programme.title: Unica Hija
programme.desc: The tragic death of his daughter and the ensuing breakdown of his marriage leads a scientist to clone his daughter, with the hope of bringing his wife back to him. However, others take interest in his daring but morally questionable experiment, leading to his demise. Bianca, the clone, is taken in by an unsuspecting couple, and is raised as their own. Years later, the cloning is discovered. Bianca

programme.title: Hating Kapatid
programme.desc: The series follows twin siblings Tyron and Belle, separated at birth and raised in vastly different worlds. When fate brings them together, their bond sparks a journey of discovery, love, and rivalry-- unaware of the truth that binds them.

programme.title: Cruz Vs. Cruz
programme.desc: is a story of the two families of Ryan Cruz. He left his original family in the Philippines to work abroad and provide for them. During his time as an OFW, he meets a woman who lures him to marry her after she gets pregnant.

programme.title: It's Showtime
programme.desc: 'It's Showtime' is a hit variety program that thrives on spontaneity and animated conversations.

programme.title: Ikaw Ang Miss Universe Ng Buhay Ko
programme.desc: Andrew E and his gang rescued the damsels in distress from a robbery accident. He gave them food and lodging in his humble home, hopeful that someday, Charlene, one of the girls he rescued, would learn to love him.

programme.title: Berdugo (Gabriel Lorenzo)
programme.desc: He is an honest and dedicated cop whose life shatters when a drug syndicate frames him up and massacres his family.

programme.title: Pintsik Haik
programme.desc: As a head of a small time general services, business and some illegal activity, Mando is satisfied enough on what they earned and share some blessings to the charity. But one day he was hired to rescue the father of May-leng.

programme.title: Hindi Mo Ako Kayang Tapakan
programme.desc: This is the story of Tacing--a woman involved in different love affairs, which resulted in endless trials and tribulations. Nardo, Tom, Ramon and Angelito, were just some of the many men who became part of Tacing's life and played parts in making her accept the reality of womanhood.

programme.title: Kakaibang Karisma
programme.desc: Confined within the gripping walls of self-deprivation, disturbed by disquieting dreams and erotic fantasies, mysteroius and hauntingly beautiful Karla Estrada plays the girl with inexplicably bewitching charm in this quirky movie.

programme.title: Isla 2
programme.desc: Celso Ad Castillo once again directs with newcomer Via Veloso in the title role of Isla, the young girl who will do anything just to be able to escape her lustful adoptive father and the desolate island where she might spend her entire life.

programme.title: Manila Boy
programme.desc: Robin, as Manila Boy, played the bad boy image but tries to deviate from it by being a soft-hearted specie among the throngs of the city. He had an open heart for the needy and women were easily charmed by his down-to-earth attitude.

programme.title: Ulo Ng Gang-Ho
programme.desc: The life story of Viyong, a notorious police from Balic-Balic, Samaloc.

programme.title: Kung Mahawi Man Ang Ulap (Digitally Enhanced)
programme.desc: The happy life of Hilda and her widowed mother, Gloria, changed for the worse when Eddie and his family moved in as their tenants. In no time at all, Gloria had gotten married to Eddie and was providing for his entire family. Still, she lived for the day when she would be able to reclaim what's rightfully hers.

programme.title: Ang Probinsyano
programme.desc: FPJ is an honest policeman from the province who has just been transferred to the big city. He's being \"promdi\" makes him the butt of many humiliating jokes. Angered and challenged, he retaliates by working extra hard, and in the end proving that his being probinsyano is not the gauge to his true worth.

programme.title: Habang Nasasaktan, Lalong Tumapatang
programme.desc: The dream of a beautiful future together by two orphans came crushing down when Mario was mistaken for a bank robber and was sent to jail.

programme.title: Paikot-Ikot
programme.desc: To help combat street crime,the government forms a task force made up of narcotics agents and private detectives. Rocky and Gracia are the best investigators from the civilian group.

programme.title: Takas Sa Impiyerno
programme.desc: Hell is what the residents call their town. It is because Mayor Sebastian (Paquito Diaz) virtually sees the town as his own personal kingdom.

programme.title: Dobol Trobol
programme.desc: Nino and Hero were dutiful, loyal cops. They were also inept and were the main headaches of the police force of Baguio City. It was the luck of these bumblers, though, to stumble on a major case which had its origins in China.

programme.title: Tatlong Anak, Isang Ama
programme.desc: Set in the city of Olongapo during the last days of the US bases in the Philippines, this is a tale about the life of a musician and his three sons by three different women.

programme.title: Pati Ba Pintig Ng Puso (Digitally Enhanced)
programme.desc: Eddie Garcia was at his best as the autocratic patriarch who ruled his family and all the people around him with an iron hand. But his grandson would have none of this.

programme.title: Hawak Ko Buhay Mo
programme.desc: Ronnie Ricketts played the leader of an anti-vice squad. Two problems occupied his mind at the moment. A mysterious killer who broke the necks of his victims and a group of skinheads, who kidnapped pretty coeds to be sold to white slavery.

programme.title: Totoy Golem
programme.desc: Way back in the late 50's one of the most feared names on the streets of Manila was that of Totoy Golem of the then, notorious district of Tondo.

programme.title: Ang Pinakamagandang Hayop Sa Balat Ng Lupa 1
programme.desc: Gloria Diaz plays a strange but a beautiful woman who is washed ashore in an island where her presence causes intrigue, jealousy, strife and later on, even a series of deaths.

programme.title: Tropang Bulilit
programme.desc: Ric Rodrigo dies and he leaves his five children orphaned. The siblings miss each other so much they escape from their new homes and try their luck in Manila. As the kids go on one misadventure to another, their uncle, Lloyd Samartino is going out of his mind looking for them.

programme.title: Sala Sa Init, Sala Sa Lamig
programme.desc: Bingo was a bounty hunter. He hunted prized criminals dead or alive. On the other hand, Vina was a street hustler. They crossed paths when Bingo rented a space near Vina purposely to track down a professional hitman, Mike.

programme.title: Pita, Terror Ng Kalookan
programme.desc: Pita witnessed the murder of his favorite brother and vowed to take revenge. He did, and was jailed for his vendetta.

programme.title: Carnap King (The Randy Padilla Story)
programme.desc: The story of the most delinquent of the Padilla brothers. Randy was the problem child to his father. This conflict led him to leave and stay with his mother who love him so much. His reputation as a bad boy was stuck when he stole a car to impress a girl.
